author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
When the output is being formatted as a table, for example, the cursor ends up at the right most side rather than the left which causes progress to be calculated incorrectly.

Addresses https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/3419

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @lzybkr can you take a look?  thanks!

title: Progressbar messes up display if the cursor originally wasn't left most (x=0)
